bibl.title: Two Documents from Cairo Museum.
bibl.note: The first document has been edited in: Festschrift in Honor of Prof. Abdel Mooti Shaarawi (Cairo, 2009) pp. 77ff.; the second in: Festschrift in Honor of Prof. Hamdi Ibrahim (Cairo, 2011) pp. 1ff. - 1. P. Cair. Inv. SR 3049 (95) verso. List of names. Theadelphia, 1st-2d cent. A.D. - 2. P. Cair. Inv. SR 3049 (77). Census declaration from Theadelphia. 25 July - 23 August 161.
bibl.seg: Omar Sayed Mohamed, Two Documents from Cairo Museum.

The first document has been edited in: Festschrift in Honor of Prof. Abdel Mooti Shaarawi (Cairo, 2009) pp. 77ff.; the second in: Festschrift in Honor of Prof. Hamdi Ibrahim (Cairo, 2011) pp. 1ff. - 1. P. Cair. Inv. SR 3049 (95) verso. List of names. Theadelphia, 1st-2d cent. A.D. - 2. P. Cair. Inv. SR 3049 (77). Census declaration from Theadelphia. 25 July - 23 August 161.
